titleStmt.title: John Boyle to R. C. Hewitt
CWG14212

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: Assistant Adjutant General Letter Book - No. 1 ; 5 Sept 1863 - 2 Feb 1864

body.p:
423
Decr 27" 3.
Dr. R. C. Hewitt
Chm Med. Board
Louisville Ky
Dear Sir,

Your Board will please examine Henry T. Oliver touching his qualifications for the place of Assistant Surgeon, he having produced the necessary evidence of his loyalty and good moral character to the Governor

Yours respy
John Boyle
Adjt Genl of Ky
